messages.subject: Mommy Madness - LiveTalk Today at MSNBC
messages.msgSnippet: Finally followed an article link posted to the FloridaLIFE group after seeing it posted on another forum (word gets around!) and found the following -- hope
messages.messageBody:
Finally followed an article link posted to the FloridaLIFE group
after seeing it posted on another forum (word gets around!) and
found the following -- hope the working moms can attend:

Live Talk: The Mommy Problem
http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/6959880/site/newsweek/page/3/
Author Judith Warner will discuss what went wrong with her
generation of mothers during a Live Talk on Friday, Feb. 18, at noon
ET. Submit your questions below. (Mine can be found on the AFC
blog at http://www.ardfamilyco-op.net/WordPress)

Until later, Amigos ~
Penne & the Crew
